_header: If thy horse have four white feet give him to thy foe
_description: The properties of a horse judged by white hooves — two long couplets

BodWoodEmpt18.Transcription:
If þi horse have iiij white feet give him to þi fooAnd if
                    he haue iij dooth even sooAnd if he haue ij Gyve him thy frendeBut
                    & he haue but j were him till an ende
BodWoodEmpt18.Editions:
Hands,  Rachel. 
             “Horse-Dealing Lore, or a Fifteenth-century ‘Help to
                Discourse’?” 
             Medium Ævum
         41 (1972): 230-9: 237.
